description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

targets.expr: sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m]))
- sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m]))
sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="", node=~"^$Node$"}[1m])) / sum (machine_cpu_cores{node=~"^$Node$"}) * 100
100 - (sum (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint!="", node=~"^$Node$"}) / sum (node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint!="", node=~"^$Node$"}) * 100)
sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!="", node=~"^$Node$"})
sum (machine_memory_bytes{node=~"^$Node$"})
sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="", node=~"^$Node$"}[1m]))
sum (machine_cpu_cores{node=~"^$Node$"})
sum (node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint!="", node=~"^$Node$"}) - sum (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{mountpoint!="", node=~"^$Node$"})
sum (node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint!="", node=~"^$Node$"})
sort_desc (sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m])) by (node, pod, namespace))
sort_desc (sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{name!="",node=~"^$Node$", namespace="kube-system"}[1m])) by (name, namespace, node, pod))
sort_desc (sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", container!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m])) by (container, node, pod, namespace))
sort_desc(sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m])) by (id, node, pod, namespace))
sort_desc (sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}) by (node, pod, namespace))
sort_desc (sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{name!="",node=~"^$Node$", namespace="kube-system"}) by (node, pod, namespace, name))
sort_desc (sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="", container!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}) by (container, node, pod, namespace))
sort_desc (sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{id!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}) by (id, node, pod, namespace))
sort_desc (sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{image!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m])) by (node, pod, namespace))
sort_desc (- sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{image!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m])) by (node, pod, namespace))
sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{image!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m])) by (namespace, pod)
sort_desc (sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{id!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m])) by (id, node, pod, namespace))
sort_desc (- sum (rate (container_network_transmit_bytes_total{id!="", node=~"^$Node$", namespace=~"^$Namespace$"}[1m])) by (id, node, pod, namespace))

title: Kubernetes - Cluster Monitoring
